org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.actions

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.actions.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParameterizedAction

    public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Action API for handling invocations, parameters, and results.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        public Action(Permission permission,
              Handler<ActionResult> handler)
        The default result type is ResultType.VALUES. This value must be changed accordingly.
        Parameters:
        permission - Minimum required permission to invoke.
        handler - Handler for invocation. Allowed to be null for profiles.

    • Method Detail

      • setHidden

        public void setHidden(boolean hidden)
        Used to the action as hidden from DSA. This allows the creation of action profiles
        Parameters:
        hidden - Whether to hide the action or not.

      • setPermission

        public void setPermission(Permission permission)
        Updates the permission level of the action.
        Parameters:
        permission - New permission level

      • setResultType

        public Action setResultType(ResultType type)
        The default result type ResultType.VALUES and must be set accordingly.
        Parameters:
        type - The new result type to set.
        Returns:
        Current object for daisy chaining.

      • addParameter

        public Action addParameter(Parameter parameter)
        Parameters:
        parameter - Add a parameter for the invocation
        Returns:
        Current object for daisy chaining

      • addResult

        public Action addResult(Parameter parameter)
        Parameters:
        parameter - Add a result for the invocation
        Returns:
        Current object for daisy chaining;

      • setParams

        public void setParams(java.util.Collection<Parameter> newParams)

        Parameters:

                                   SubscriptionManager manager)

      • invoke

        public void invoke(ActionResult result)
        Invokes the action.
        Parameters:
        result - Result to populate as a result of invocation

      • isHidden

        public boolean isHidden()
        Hidden actions are used for action profiles.
        Returns:
        Whether the action is hidden or not.

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission()
        Returns:
        Whether the user has permission to invoke
